segments.text: Do you buy that newspaper every day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . I find it very informative . It always has plenty of articles from correspondents all over the world and the business section is very useful too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a Sunday edition of that newspaper ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . There is . it has several sections , so it ’ s quite a read ! It usually takes me a few hours to read it on Sunday morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . There ’ s the news section , the entertainment section , sports , business , and world affairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: World affairs ? They look at the most important stories in more detail . I find it fascinating . Do you buy a daily paper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I buy a national newspaper sometimes , buy I nearly always buy a local evening newspaper . I find the local news more interesting than national or international news .
segments.speaker: S1
